p: Three mini reviews explore how agricultural modellers are tackling specific challenges to CC adaptation modelling (main paper Fig. 2). The first considers how modellers work with stakeholders (main paper Fig. 2, A, D), and the remaining two focus on ‘Content of models’ challenges (main paper Fig. 2B and C) and cover bio-economic modelling and biophysical modelling. Collaboration (main paper Fig. 2, E) is covered in the main text.
